PageTitle: peer description(BGP multi-instance VPN instance IPv4 address family view)(IPv4)
FuncDef:
The peer description command configures a description for a peer.
The undo peer description command deletes the description of a peer. The peer description command configures a description for a peer. The undo peer description command deletes the description of a peer. By default, no description is configured for a peer.
ParentView: BGP multi-instance VPN instance IPv4 address family view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IPv4 address of a peer.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a description.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 characters. Letters, digits, and spaces are supported.

ExtraInfo: The peer description can be used to configure a description for a peer, which facilitates management of peers or peer groups. The description records information about the peer, such as the VPN instance to which the peer belongs, and devices that establish peer relationships with the peer.
